org.spf4j.pool

Interface ObjectPool<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface ObjectPool<T>
extends Disposable
    Object pool interface. My goal is to create a simpler and better object pool interface and implementation.
    Author:
    zoly

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ObjectPool.Factory<T> 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T borrowObject()
      block until a object is available and return it.
      void returnObject(T object, Exception e)
      return a object previously borrowed from the pool, together with a optional exception in case one was encountered while using the object.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spf4j.pool.Disposable

        dispose

    • Method Detail

      • borrowObject

        @Nonnull
T borrowObject()
               throws ObjectCreationException,
                      ObjectBorrowException,
                      InterruptedException,
                      TimeoutException
        block until a object is available and return it.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ObjectCreationException
        ObjectBorrowException
        InterruptedException
        TimeoutException

      • returnObject

        void returnObject(T object,
                @Nullable
                Exception e)
        return a object previously borrowed from the pool, together with a optional exception in case one was encountered while using the object. passing an exception will cause the object to be validated and potentially retired from the pool.
        Parameters:
        object -
        e -
